```{r}
library(tidyverse)
View(starwars)

starwars2 <- starwars %>% unnest(films) %>% 
  group_by(name) %>% 
  summarise(n())

## map_*(input_column, function)

starwars3 <- starwars %>%
  mutate(film_count = map(films, length)) %>% 
  relocate(film_count)

starwars3[[1, 1]]
#first item in the column, first column
starwars3 %>% pluck(1,3)
# first column, 3rd item in column

starwars3 %>% unnest(film_count)

# combining vehicles and starships into one column:

starwars %>% mutate(driven = map2(vehicles, starships, c)) %>% relocate(driven)
```
